books.author: Jay Newman
books.review: Books in Physics have usually the difficulty to show direct/indirect link to everyday life events and in particular to show relevance to famous or hidden applications in biology and agriculture. I find some interesting 'fill-in the gap' in this regard in this book. This is the reason I've purchased it This is being said as positive point standing for this book I do not hesitate to say that the writer could have been more aware of typing his text in more 'elegant way' that corresponds to the importance of his work, this high-end talent is missed. It can be improved in future versions of this nice book.

books.author: Kate Chopin
books.review: I had discover this book because I studied it during my courses. I’m really surprised that I never heard about it before! For her time Kate Chopin was a real revolutionary, she breaks all the woman conventions and doesn’t hesitate to show us a new type of woman! It’s not really long to read, I think everyone should read it. It’s a great leçon.

books.author: Muhammad Zafrulla Khan
books.review: I like this collection because it has very relevant and interesting subject matters which the Hadiths fall under. I reccomend them because the array of sources are numerous and sahih, of course. Some of the wording of the translation can be a bit tricky, but is quickly understood if read again with patience and effort.

books.author: J. D. Salinger
books.review: I got this book with no expectations. But after reading it, it was almost like talking to my old high school self again. The dialogue provides a very sincere and relatable experience that one could find when talking to a high schooler.

books.bookName: Nudge Psychology: Critical Strategies for Profitable Investing
books.author: John L Shelton Ph.D.
books.review: I have been hearing of this book until I got a copy few days ago. I have not been able to drop it. Deep. Insightful. A new and proven way to get into money. Thank you

books.author: Joan Ekobena
books.review: The book is an eye opener and inspirational. It is so captivating and when you start reading there is no stopping. It is a life changer. The book has been a blessing to me as I start applying what I have read. Money Locates You is a most have. Yes!!! money is locating me through Money Locates You.

books.bookName: It Ends with Us: A Novel
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.review: Such a beautifully written book! My heart ached, it, it swelled, it felt all the things. Honestly, I’ve been telling everyone to pick up this book. It’s a beautiful yet painful love story. Lily is such a stunningly strong protagonist.

books.bookName: Stephen King's The Dark Tower Concordance
books.author: Robin Furth
books.review: So many characters and places are tied to the Dark Tower as any constant reader knows. This is a great concordance that helps recall characters! Thank you!
